comments.en:
The author introduces the driver on his web page as follows:

The driver differs from the bjc600/bjc800 driver (first, it is not part of colour deskjets 'gdevcdj.c' ). It has extra capabilities, for example:

  • Output gamma correction (Grey or RGB)
  • Colour correction based on paper colour (RGB)
  • Colour inks can be used separately for monochrom or greyscale printing (Cyan, Magenta, Yellow, Cyan+Magenta=Blue, Cyan+Yellow=Green or Magenta+Yellow=Red)
  • Inverse printing
  • Setable Media type
  • Setable printing quality
  • ...
